Methods

convert Takes in a config object with propreties: src, outputName, ffmpegBin and optional callback.(config)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
config object

The parameter containting attribute options.

Properties
Name Type Description
src string

full path of video or audio to convert.
outputName string

full path of video file name, needs to have .webm extension.
ffmpegBin string

Path to the ffmpeg binary. Optional, if no provided it will try to use system one if present.
Returns:

config.callback - Optional callback to return when video done processing. It returns the converted webm path name. Same as config.outputName input.

Type
callback

convertToWav(file, audioFile, ffmpegPath)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
file string

path to audio or viceo file to convert to wav
audioFile string

path to output wav audio file
ffmpegPath string

path to ffmpeg binary. If not present it will try to use system one.
Returns:

callback - callback to return audio file path as string.

Type
callback

finishedSplit()

helper function used as callback to add info on trimmed clips to list of files.

helper function used as callback to add info on trimmed clips to list of files.

Parameters:
Type Description
string

name of the audio clip
number

clip time offset in seconds, in 5 min intervals
Returns:

callback - return list of files

Type
callback

parse()

Takes IBM Watson STT Service json and adds time offest onto each word.

Takes IBM Watson STT Service json and adds time offest onto each word.
this is so that each chunk of audio that has been transcribed separately can be joined back togethere.

SendToWatson()

takes in autio file path

.

Parameters:
Type Description
audioFile
keys
Returns:
  • returns callback with file path to text file containing transcriptions.
Type

Example
languageModel for IBM can only be one of these, as string
ar-AR_BroadbandModel
en-UK_BroadbandModel
en-UK_NarrowbandModel
en-US_BroadbandModel
en-US_NarrowbandModel
es-ES_BroadbandModel
es-ES_NarrowbandModel
fr-FR_BroadbandModel
ja-JP_BroadbandModel
ja-JP_NarrowbandModel
pt-BR_BroadbandModel
pt-BR_NarrowbandModel
zh-CN_BroadbandModel
zh-CN_NarrowbandModel

split(file, tmpFolder, ffmpegBinPath, ffprobeBinPath, callback)

splits an audio file, if it exceeds 5 minutes, in 5 minutes intervalls.

splits an audio file, if it exceeds 5 minutes, in 5 minutes intervalls.
using ffprobe to read duration. ffmpeg passed to trimmer module.
saves trimmed clips in temp folder.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
file string

audio file path
tmpFolder string

path to a temporary folder to put temporary audio files created when dividing audio file into chunks to send to STT API.
ffmpegBinPath string

path to ffmpeg binary. to pass to trimmer module
ffprobeBinPath string

path to ffprobe binary. If not present it will try to use system one.
callback callback

-
To Do:
  • refactor using config, needs refactroing index.js of sam transcriber if you do
Returns:

callback - returns array of audio clips names with offsts eg [{ name: filename, offset: 0 }]

Type
callback

transcribe(config)

Takes in the file path to a media audio or video file and returns a json of transcription.

Takes in the file path to a media audio or video file and returns a json of transcription.
converts audio or media file into audio meeting IBM Specs
divides audio to send to STT API into 5 min chunks
sends all clips all at once
reconnects results as returned by STT API into one json file that meets the autoEdit2 specs
returns that as callback

Parameters:
Name Type Description
config object

The parameter containting attribute options.

Properties
Name Type Description
videoFile string

path file name to video or audio file to transcribe
tmpPath string

path to a temporary folder to put temporary audio files created when dividing audio file into chunks to send to STT API.
ffmpegBin string

path to ffmpeg binary. If not present it will try to use system one.
ffprobePath string

path to ffprobe binary. If not present it will try to use system one.
audioFileOutput string

path file name for audio file that ISIS created to send to STT API for transcription.
Returns:

config.callback - Optional callback to return when transcription has done processing. It returns an json object of the transcription.

Type
callback

trim(config)

Trims a video or audio file

.

Trims a video or audio file

Parameters:
Name Type Description
config object

The parameter containting attribute options.

Properties
Name Type Description
src string

video or audio file path,relative to computer root
input number

input point for cutting video or audio from
duration number

duration to cut video or audio for how long
outputName string

desired name of the trimmed clip
Returns:

config.callback - Optional callback to return when transcription has done processing. It returns output name and input.

Type
callback
